video.title: Salamander
video.synopsis: As he investigates a bank robbery, a Brussels police inspector uncovers a complex conspiracy with the potential to bring down the nation.

episodes.synopsis: A professional criminal gang tunnels into the Jonkhere Bank in Brussels. Sixty-six of the 800 safes are opened, but the rest remain untouched.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: After the break-in at Jonkhere Bank and his friend is murdered, Paul Gerardi realizes he's caught in a hornet's nest and must run for his life.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Paul Gerardi's former boss, ex-Chief of Police Martin Colla, provides Paul with a hiding place in the monastery.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: After being betrayed, Paul is discovered at the monastery and the net closes in around him. The robbery victims start receiving mysterious packages.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: The procurator-general tries to convince Paul to track down those responsible for the break-in. The senator's wife passes information to Paul.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: With the eager help of Karin Rasenberg, Paul Gerardi discovers that Salamander saved a member of the royal family from a sordid scandal.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: After the murder of his wife, Sarah, Paul recklessly throws himself into the hunt for Salamander.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: The man behind the bank break-in now has Klaus send out envelopes containing incriminating material. A dark crisis threatens the state.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The royal palace sees the crisis getting out of hand and wants to make an example of someone -- a head must roll.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: With the struggle getting vicious and coming out into the open, Salamander plays its best card: Vincent Noël, the Prime Minister's aide.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Paul Gerardi finds himself inadvertently staying at the home of the man who organized the break-in, dangerously close to unraveling the secret.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Now that the Wolfs know Paul Gerardi's true identity, they fear the worst. Klaus takes matters into his own hands, with catastrophic consequences.
episodes.title: Episode 12
